title: Tomato Soup - Quick and very tasty!!
ingredients: ['1 Tin Plum Tomatoes(whole or chopped)', '1 Knorr Vegetable Stock Cube', '1 garlic clove', '1 large onion', '1.5 pints water', '2 heaped dessertspoon sugar', '5 fl oz single cream', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cumin', 'light sprinkle of ground ginger', 'black pepper']
